review: Every other Android and iOS device are capable of doing this, why not the Fire TV? It seems fast and I bought this device on the road since I'm spending a lot of time in hotels but since nearly all hotels use web login for internet access I'm not able to use it. I can tether it to my phone but I'm not willing to use up my data. Amazon really needs to make an update, this is a deal breaker. BTW, I've tried a lot of the hack suggestions which none of them worked for me. Please fix it.
